title: 35W collapse
author: VD
content_html:
The collapse of the bridge over the Mississippi is pretty bizarre, I’ve probably driven over it more than 500 times myself. It’s one of the bridges linking downtown Minneapolis and downtown St. Paul, so everyone in the Twin Cities travels across it from time to time, if not every day.

Fortunately, it wasn’t wintertime or it could have been a lot worse. Hope everyone’s all right.
content_text:
The collapse of the bridge over the Mississippi is pretty bizarre, I’ve probably driven over it more than 500 times myself.  It’s one of the bridges linking downtown Minneapolis and downtown St. Paul, so everyone in the Twin Cities travels across it from time to time, if not every day.
Fortunately, it wasn’t wintertime or it could have been a lot worse.  Hope everyone’s all right.
